      GET_USER_BY_EMAIL
      "SELECT u.*, r.roleName, o.gstNumber, o.cin, o.panNumber, o.aadhaarNumber AS ownerAadhaar, c.aadhaarNumber AS customerAadhaar FROM User u LEFT JOIN Role r ON u.roleId = r.roleId LEFT JOIN GymOwner o ON u.userId = o.userId LEFT JOIN GymCustomer c ON u.userId = c.userId WHERE u.email = ?"
      public static final String
